headline: Palantir Gets a Buy Call Despite Valuation. The Stock Is a ‘Secular Winner.’
summary: Piper Sandler analyst Brent Bracelin initiated coverage of the stock, rating it at Overweight with a price target of $170.  Piper Sandler has monitored the stock since before its direct listing in 2020, through late 2022, when it plummeted to $6, and into 2025, “where PLTR has been crowned an AI All-Star on accelerating growth,” Bracelin wrote.

headline: Accenture is upskilling employees in AI with structured curriculum
summary: Accenture is using persona-based curriculums to "upskill" employees, Asia Pacific Data & AI Lead Vivek Luthra told #FortuneAISingapore.
